headline.main: Diet Advice: Eat, Drink and Don't Worry

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: EVERY day - but especially as bathing-suit season nears - millions of Americans gird themselves to embark on a diet, riveted by the fantasy that life would be better if they were lighter and slighter.
docs.snippet: LEAD: EVERY day - but especially as bathing-suit season nears - millions of Americans gird themselves to embark on a diet, riveted by the fantasy that life would be better if they were lighter and slighter.
